Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Moroz, V. I., Petrova, E. V., Ksanfomality, L. V., Ganpantzerova, O. F., Goroshkova, N. V., Zharkov, A. V., Nikitin, G. E., Esposito, L., Bibring, J.-P., Combes, M., Soufflot, A., Characteristics of aerosol phenomena in Martian atmosphere from KRFM experiment data, Planetary and Space Science, vol. 39, Jan.-Feb. 1991, pp. 199-207.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Visual and Thermal IR photometry of Mars from the KRFM experiment on the Phobos 2 spacecraft, preserved for historical reasons.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set consists of the set of visual and thermal infrared band photometry of Mars obtained by the KRFM experiment on the Phobos 2 spacecraft. The data are presented as a table of samples for 14 wavelength channels, with successive lines (rows) in the table obtained at 1-second intervals. The 5 infrared channels occur first, followed by 9 visual band channels. These data are preserved for historical reasons, but are not considered to be of archival quality.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data set consists of the set of visual and thermal infrared band photometry of Mars obtained by the KRFM experiment on the Phobos 2 spacecraft. The data are presented as a table of samples for 14 wavelength channels, with successive lines (rows) in the table obtained at 1-second intervals. The 5 infrared channels occur first, followed by 9 visual band channels.
These data are preserved for historical reasons, but are not considered to be of archival quality.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note: Confidence Level Overview ========================= These data are preserved for historical reasons, but are not considered to be of archival quality.
